question:
Task: add a fourth tile to the word
Configurations: The robot has 1 arm(s) with 5 DoFs and rigid No specified Gripper and it can not walk., The robot has 1 arm(s) with 6 DoFs and rigid No specified Gripper and it can not walk., The robot has 1 arm(s) with 1 DoFs and rigid No specified Gripper and it can not walk., The robot has 1 arm(s) with 6 DoFs and rigid Robot Grippers with 2 Fingers and it can not walk., The robot has 1 arm(s) with 7 DoFs and rigid Robot Grippers with 2 Fingers and it can not walk.
Your Choice:
full_answer:
Considering the task of adding a fourth tile to a word, the most suitable hardware configuration would be one that provides sufficient degrees of freedom (DoFs) for precise manipulation and control, as well as a functional gripper to securely handle the tiles. 

Among the options provided, the configuration that best meets these requirements is:

The robot has 1 arm(s) with 7 DoFs and rigid Robot Grippers with 2 Fingers and it can not walk.
final_answer: The robot has 1 arm(s) with 7 DoFs and rigid Robot Grippers with 2 Fingers and it can not walk.
correct_answer: The robot has 1 arm(s) with 7 DoFs and rigid Robot Grippers with 2 Fingers and it can not walk.
